history.proof: intros b0 b1 H. destruct b0, b1. - reflexivity. - discriminate H. - discriminate H. - reflexivity.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall b0 b1 : bool, eq_bool b0 b1 = true -> b0 = b1

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
eq_bool = fun b0 b1 : bool => if b0 then if b1 then true else false else if b1 then false else true : bool -> bool -> bool Argument scopes are [bool_scope bool_scope]
eq_true_iff_eq : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 = true < -> b2 = true -> b1 = b2
bool_eq_ok : forall b1 b2 : bool, bool_eq b1 b2 = true -> b1 = b2
orb_true_intro : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 = true \/ b2 = true -> b1 || b2 = true
orb_true_iff : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 || b2 = true < -> b1 = true \/ b2 = true
orb_comm : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 || b2 = b2 || b1
orb_true_elim : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 || b2 = true -> {b1 = true} + {b2 = true}
eq_iff_eq_true : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 = b2 < -> (b1 = true <-> b2 = true)

bool_eq = fun b1 b2 : bool => if b1 then b2 else negb b2 : bool -> bool -> bool Argument scopes are [bool_scope bool_scope]
eqb = fun b1 b2 : bool => if b1 then if b2 then true else false else if b2 then false else true : bool -> bool -> bool Argument scopes are [bool_scope bool_scope]
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.for_all_mem_2 : forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> forall s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.for_all f s = true -> forall x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true -> f x = true
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.exists_mem_3 : forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool, SetoidList.compat_bool eq f -> forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true -> f x = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.exists_ f s = true
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.exists_mem_2 : forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool, SetoidList.compat_bool eq f -> forall s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.exists_ f s = false -> forall x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true -> f x = false
andb_true_eq : forall a b : bool, true = a && b -> true = a /\ true = b
orb_prop : forall a b : bool, a || b = true -> a = true \/ b = true
eqb_prop : forall a b : bool, eqb a b = true -> a = b
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.exists_mem_4 : forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool, SetoidList.compat_bool eq f -> forall s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.exists_ f s = true -> {x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt | FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true /\ f x = true}
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.for_all_mem_1 : forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> forall s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, (forall x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true -> f x = true) -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.for_all f s = true
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.for_all_mem_3 : forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true -> f x = false -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.for_all f s = false
Field_theory.if_true : forall a b : bool, (if a then b else false) = true -> a = true /\ b = true
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.for_all_mem_4 : forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> forall s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.for_all f s = false -> {x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt | FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true /\ f x = false}
not_true_is_false : forall b : bool, b <> true -> b = false
eq_true_not_negb : forall b : bool, b <> true -> negb b = true
eq_true_negb_classical : forall b : bool, negb b <> true -> b = true
negb_true_iff : forall b : bool, negb b = true < -> b = false
negb_false_iff : forall b : bool, negb b = false < -> b = true
orb_true_r : forall b : bool, b || true = true
xorb_true_l : forall b : bool, xorb true b = negb b
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.subset_mem_2 : forall s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.subset s s' = true -> forall a : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem a s = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem a s' = true
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.for_all_filter : forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> forall s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.for_all f s = FSetPositive.PositiveSet.is_empty (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.filter (fun x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt => negb (f x)) s)
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.for_all_exists : forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> forall s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.exists_ f s = negb (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.for_all (fun x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt => negb (f x)) s)
not_true_iff_false : forall b : bool, b <> true < -> b = false
xorb_nilpotent : forall b : bool, xorb b b = false
xorb_false_r : forall b : bool, xorb b false = b
Nbit0_less : forall a a' : N, N.odd a = false -> N.odd a' = true -> Nless a a' = true
VectorEq.eqb_eq : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), VectorEq.eqb A A_beq v1 v2 = true < -> v1 = v2
Nbit0_gt : forall a a' : N, N.odd a = true -> N.odd a' = false -> Nless a a' = false
Nbit0_neq : forall a a' : N, N.odd a = false -> N.odd a' = true -> (a =? a')%N = false
Nless_trans : forall a a' a'' : N, Nless a a' = true -> Nless a' a'' = true -> Nless a a'' = true
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.subset_mem_1 : forall s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, (forall a : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem a s = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem a s' = true) -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.subset s s' = true

```intros b0 b1 H.
destruct b0, b1.
- reflexivity.
- discriminate H.
- discriminate H.
- reflexivity.
Qed.```

original: intros b0 b1 H. destruct b0, b1. - reflexivity. - discriminate H. - discriminate H. - reflexivity.
